meanings.sent1: He wore the dorkiest glasses in the class.
meanings.sent2: She felt like the dorkiest person at the party.
meanings.sent3: The dorkiest thing happened on his way to school.
meanings.sent4: Her dorkiest moment was when she tripped over her own shoelaces.
meanings.sent5: The dorkiest cat in the neighborhood always wore a tiny hat.

meanings.sent1: He danced dorkiest at the school talent show.
meanings.sent2: She spoke dorkiest when she was nervous.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked dorkiest when trying to catch its tail.
meanings.sent4: The robot moved dorkiest when its batteries were low.
meanings.sent5: The clown juggled dorkiest with oversized shoes on.
